sentences.sContent: I will go to Shanghai in the coming January.
sentences.sContent_eng: I will go to Shanghai in the coming January.
sentences.sCn: 在即将到来的一月份，我将去上海。

sentences.sContent: The lake usually freezes over by mid January.
sentences.sContent_eng: The lake usually freezes over by mid January.
sentences.sCn: 这条湖通常在一月中旬冰封。

sentences.sContent: Their first child was conceived in January and born in October.
sentences.sContent_eng: Their first child was conceived in January and born in October.
sentences.sCn: 他们的第一个孩子是在一月怀上、十月出生的。

trans.tranOther: the first month of the year, between December and February
